FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: graded
FIELD.COMMENT: whether or not the quiz is graded

FIELD.NAME: scale
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum amount of points to scale the end grade to

FIELD.NAME: grademethod
FIELD.COMMENT: The grading method for grading. This only applies to grading with multiple sessions, not multiple attempts

FIELD.NAME: workedingroups
FIELD.COMMENT: Bit to specify if the activity is set up to work in groups

FIELD.NAME: groupattendance
FIELD.COMMENT: whether or not we want to have the user specify the group members present for the quiz

FIELD.NAME: grouping
FIELD.COMMENT: The grouping id that this activity is set up to use for groups

FIELD.NAME: reviewoptions
FIELD.COMMENT: JSON encoded string of the review options from the mod form

FIELD.NAME: defaultquestiontime
FIELD.COMMENT: How long do they get for each question?

FIELD.NAME: waitforquestiontime
FIELD.COMMENT: The time to wait for a question before displaying students the question

FIELD.NAME: questionorder
FIELD.COMMENT: The question order for the activequiz

TABLE.NAME: activequiz_questions
TABLE.COMMENT: table to hold question information for active quizzes

FIELD.NAME: activequizid
FIELD.COMMENT: The realtime quiz this question instance is associated with

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The question id for the question in the question engine

FIELD.NAME: notime
FIELD.COMMENT: Bit field to signify there is no time limit for this question

FIELD.NAME: questiontime
FIELD.COMMENT: Question time in seconds. 0 means default for the quiz

FIELD.NAME: tries
FIELD.COMMENT: number of tries for the question

FIELD.NAME: points
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of points for this question

FIELD.NAME: showhistoryduringquiz
FIELD.COMMENT: whether or not to show the question step data with a response during the quiz

FIELD.NAME: activequizid
FIELD.COMMENT: the activequizid for the sessions

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: the session name

FIELD.NAME: anonymize_responses
FIELD.COMMENT: Anonymize student names within a session

FIELD.NAME: fully_anonymize
FIELD.COMMENT: Fully anonymize the session, meaning that userids will not be kept for attempts and therefore grading will not be possible for the session

FIELD.NAME: sessionopen
FIELD.COMMENT: whether or not the session is open

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: the current status/state of the session

FIELD.NAME: currentquestion
FIELD.COMMENT: The current question that the session is on

FIELD.NAME: currentqnum
FIELD.COMMENT: the current question number we're on

FIELD.NAME: currentquestiontime
FIELD.COMMENT: the time the current question is allowed in seconds

FIELD.NAME: classresult
FIELD.COMMENT: the overall class result for the session. TODO: not sure if this will be needed or not

FIELD.NAME: nextstarttime
FIELD.COMMENT: the timestamp of the next start time

FIELD.NAME: created
FIELD.COMMENT: the timestamp that this was created

TABLE.NAME: activequiz_groupattendance
TABLE.COMMENT: table to specify users that were a part of the group when a active quiz session took place.

FIELD.NAME: activequizid
FIELD.COMMENT: The realtime quiz id that this particular matching matches to

FIELD.NAME: sessionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The session id that this attendance item belongs to

FIELD.NAME: attemptid
FIELD.COMMENT: The realtime quiz attempt id that this group member is present for

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: The groupid that the attempt is for. This is more for display purposes if we want to display this somewhere

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user that will get a grade for this attempt if they were added during the "attendance check" before a group user started their attempt

TABLE.NAME: activequiz_attempts
TABLE.COMMENT: The quiz attempts table to hold attempts for students within a particular session

FIELD.NAME: sessionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The session this attempt belongs to

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The userid for this attempt

FIELD.NAME: attemptnum
FIELD.COMMENT: The attempt number for this user, for this session

FIELD.NAME: questionengid
FIELD.COMMENT: The unique id that is used for the question engine's usage for loading the activity by id.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The status of the attempt

FIELD.NAME: preview
FIELD.COMMENT: bit as to wether or not this is a preview attempt

FIELD.NAME: responded
FIELD.COMMENT: whether or not the user responded for the particular sesson's current question

FIELD.NAME: responded_count
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of times the current question had been responded to for the attempt

FIELD.NAME: forgroupid
FIELD.COMMENT: This is used when the activequiz is set up to be in groups. The groupid will go here to signify that this attempt is for that group

FIELD.NAME: timestart
FIELD.COMMENT: datetime/timestampe for when the attempt was started

FIELD.NAME: timefinish
FIELD.COMMENT: the datetime/timestamp for when the attempt was finished

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: the datetime/timestamp for when this attempt record was modified

FIELD.NAME: qubalayout
FIELD.COMMENT: the layout for this particular attempt

TABLE.NAME: activequiz_grades
TABLE.COMMENT: activequiz grades table to hold grades for individual users

FIELD.NAME: activequizid
FIELD.COMMENT: the activequiz id

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The userid that this grade is for

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The grade for this user, for this activequiz

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time created/modified for this grade
